Articles.Content: With all the huge fusion plants and (hopefully) solar panels on the horizon, how about some terawatt laser installations and sails for our ships to increase that interstellar mass fraction?
I think in some early interviews Nate said this kind of drive sounds awesome but isn't planned right away. Maybe in future expansions?
It's not a bad idea for a DLC if you combine it with another solar system I suppose...
